text: Uha hi hai jisa ne tuhanu miti tom paida kita phira viraja tom, phira khuna de lothare tom, phira uha tuhanu bace de rupa vica kadhada hai phira uha tuhada vikasa karada hai tam ki tusim apani javani di avasatha nu pahuco phira hora vadha'unda hai tam ki tusim biradha avasatha nu pahuco. Ate ko'i tam tuhade vicom isa tom pahilam hi mara janda hai ate tam ki tusim mithe same taka pahuca javo â€œtam ki tusim citana karo
